name: Product Dropdown For Contact Form 7
author: howdytheme

sections.description:
Product Dropdown For Contact Form 7 Making Product List Field to you contact form. This field creates a dropdown of current user’s product.

Be sure that every product has selected category and tag to get product.

FEATURES:

  • Required field
  • Display product using product id(eg: 23-29)
  • Select product category and tag
  • Allow multiple product selection
  • setting id and class of the product dropdown field (optional)

Documentation
Live Demo
Get Premium

FEATURES FOR PREMIUM:

  • Display product dropdown using product attribute e.g. (color, size)
  • Display product dropdown using product stock status e.g. (in stock, out of stock)
  • Allow product price
  • Allow product search box
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have Contact Form 7, WooCommerce installed.
  2. Download the file to install and activate.
  3. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
